task.prompt: Carrie wants to buy a new iPhone. The new iPhone costs $800. She can trade in her Samsung Galaxy for $240. She can make $80 per week babysitting. How many weeks does she have to work before she can purchase the iPhone?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: Carrie wants to buy a new iPhone. The new iPhone costs $800. She can trade in her Samsung Galaxy for $240. She can make $80 per week babysitting. How many weeks does she have to work before she can purchase the iPhone?
Work through the math carefully and keep intermediate values.
